scripts.dev:local: npm run dynamodb:start && npm run dev
scripts.test:local: npm run dynamodb:start && npm test && npm run dynamodb:stop
scripts.test:localstack: npm run localstack:start && npm run localstack:setup && npm run dynamodb:start && npm run dynamodb:create-tables && npm test && npm run dynamodb:stop && npm run localstack:stop
scripts.dynamodb:stop: taskkill /F /IM java.exe /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq DynamoDB Local*" 2>nul || pkill -f dynamodb-local || true
scripts.dynamodb:reset: npm run dynamodb:stop && npm run dynamodb:setup
scripts.localstack:reset: npm run localstack:stop && npm run localstack:setup
scripts.test:localstack: npm run localstack:start && npm run localstack:setup && npm run dynamodb:start && npm run dynamodb:create-tables && npm test && npm run dynamodb:stop && npm run localstack:stop
